name: Gitter Inspired Dark
description: The Gitter Inspired Dark theme is a Gitter instant messaging service dark style, that refines styling throughout all elements and areas. Tested in Firefox , Google Chrome, Opera with Openstyles Stylus. Feedback is welcome and appreciated. To view the project page click here. To report any issue(s) click here. ■ Install as UserCSS (Stylus Users) click here. Sites Covered ■ https://gitter.im
additional_info:
This is the initial beta version for public testing and gain feedback. To view full changelog click here.
